title: Heartbreak Drugs
lyrics:
Numb my heart, one hundred (.....)
Under her to get over you
It hurts too much right now to think things through
So I do drugs to forget you
I wish, I wish, I wish I never put in work

I wish I had thrown your number in the dirt

I wish, I wish, I wish I took my sister's word

To stay the hell away and out my family first

Now I don’t even know how I should act

So I'm out in the valley gettin' trashed

I wish, I wish, I wish I never put in work

I wish you really were the girl I thought you were



Numb my heart, one hundred (.....)

Under her to get over you

It hurts too much right now to think things through

So I do drugs to forget you



Ooh, I need ’em

I need 'em heartbreak drugs

Ooh, I need 'em

I need 'em heartbreak drugs

Ooh, I need 'em

I need 'em heartbreak drugs

Ooh, I need 'em

I need 'em heartbreak drugs



I swear to God, I used to be a happy guy

Now all I wear is black and all I do is cry

Before you, I never did nothing in my life

Now I can’t get enough to even get me high

Well, I don’t even know how I should act

So I'm out in the valley gettin’ trashed

I swear to God, I used to be a happy guy





Numb my heart, one hundred (.....)

Under her to get over you

It hurts too much right now to think things through

So I do drugs to forget you



Ooh, I need 'em

I need 'em heartbreak drugs

Ooh, I need 'em

I need ’em heartbreak drugs

Ooh, I need 'em

I need 'em heartbreak drugs

Ooh, I need 'em

I need 'em heartbreak drugs
